Initiative Application

Find Balance

Core hours ensure everybody's availability. Plan the rest as you wish.

Get Better

We help you grow. Use your 10 paid learning days per year.

Work With A Purpose

Impact the daily life of millions of users all over the world.

Compensation And Benefits

Competitive salaries, meal tickets, health insurance, sport subscriptions, etc.

We Just Wanna Have Fun

Small Gatherings and our annual team event with all colleagues create epic memories.

It's Not Just Us, Not Just now

We build a liveable future and help those who are less fortunate.

Hit The Ground Running

Everything you need when you need it. You name it, we got it.

Work From Anywhere

Make sure you can really work and never let your team down.

You'll Never Walk Alone

Mentor or mentee: your team always has your back.

#GOHealthy

Get fit together, challenging each other in sports activities.

We Love Vacation

You start with 24 vacation days and collect more over time.

#NoMeetingDays

Take time to focus, learn, and recenter.

Achieving More as a Team

Together we work and play; we fail and succeed; we teach and learn. Above all, we build together through thick and thin.

Learning Organization

“Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.” - Samuel Beckett. We live this, support it, and expect it. Don't be afraid to try. We are with you.

Striving for Excellence

Right from the start one of our mentors - or womentors - will take care of you, guide you, and help you grow towards excellence.

Creating Communities

At 3SS we build strong, dynamic, and caring communities. We bond internally, including exchanges across offices. Externally, we take part in charity events and enable online learning for kids, parents and teachers.

Our Initiatives

Grow In Your Way!
Who would not want to be the best version of themselves? To get there, each of us has to evolve and grow. We want to help you find out how you want to grow, establishing a way to get there together and assisting you on your journey!

Connect With Each Other!
‍Enjoying life is a worthy goal. Doing so with others, even more so. We are launching several activities to help us bridge the gaps between locations, perceived hierarchical levels and cultures.

Balance Your Lifestyle
Work can be stressful - so can private life. While we cannot help much with the latter, we aim to make the former a bit more healthy with various activities to help you get in better shape, fuel your body in a healthy way and make our rather sedentary jobs less harmful.

Build A Liveable Future!
It is nice to live long and healthy. But what if the world we grow old in, turns out to be a much less friendly place than it is now? We want to do our part to prevent that: We actively try to reduce, reuse, recycle waste, minimize our carbon footprint ansd help the planet to produce more oxygen.

Our Initiatives

#GOBond

Connect With Each Other!Enjoying life is a worthy goal. Doing so with others, even more so. We are launching several activities to help us bridge the gaps between locations, perceived hierarchical levels and cultures.

#GOTalks

Grow In Your Way!Who would not want to be the best version of themselves? To get there, each of us has to evolve and grow. We want to help you find out how you want to grow, establishing a way to get there together and assisting you on your journey!

#GOCommunity

We do good - and talk about it!Not out of vanity, but with the hope to inspire others. We know that we are more fortunate than many others and try to share our good fortune. We are humbled and proud by the experiences we make while helping others.

#GOHealthy

Balance Your LifestyleWork can be stressful - so can private life. While we cannot help much with the latter, we aim to make the former a bit more healthy with various activities to help you get in better shape, fuel your body in a healthy way and make our rather sedentary jobs less harmful.

#GOGreen

Build A Liveable Future!It is nice to live long and healthy. But what if the world we grow old in, turns out to be a much less friendly place than it is now? We want to do our part to prevent that: We actively try to reduce, reuse, recycle waste, minimize our carbon footprint ansd help the planet to produce more oxygen.

Our Internships

Internships are your chance to experience real life work environment within 3SS.
We will open fantastic opportunity to you soon!
“You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.” Zig Ziglar

What our interns say:

Thanks to 3SS for the opportunity to take part in an internship. I had valuable learnings, both in my soft and hard skills. Moreover, these four weeks broadened my horizon and helped making new friendships. 3SS is exactly the company you want to become a part of.

The only way you could make the internships better is by allowing more people to join!

I had a great time, enjoyed every moment, and I will certainly apply at 3SS once I am finished with university. The people & the place are nice. Thank you very much for having me!

It was very entertaining and challenging, I had a lot of fun and I learned a lot. I have no idea how to improve the internship. 😄

I can’t complain about this internship. I enjoyed every minute of it, good company, professional people, you can't ask for more!

q
